message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $127.50. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $132.50.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $130. Can we meet there?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you the product for $131.50.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $129.50. Can we make a deal?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you the product for $130.25.
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $129. I really want to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we make a deal at this price?
